full_summary:
### Notice of Proposed Procurement
**Procurement Number:** PW-22-01006022
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** W8482-230322/A
**Publication Date:** 2022-09-01
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-10-03T14:00:00

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the procurement of filter elements suitable for air conditioning systems.

**Items to be Procured:**

* NSN: 01-4884693, FILTER ELEMENT, AIR CONDITIONING, GT2/001392F, NCAGE: 1T3E2, ALTAIR FILTER TECHNOLOGY
* Quantity: 150 units, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* NSN: 01-4884693, FILTER ELEMENT, AIR CONDITIONING, GT2/001392F, NCAGE: 1T3E2, ALTAIR FILTER TECHNOLOGY
* Quantity: 70 units, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

**Bidding Requirements:**

* Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name, model, and part number as well as the NCAGE.
* Prices must be submitted in Canadian dollars; bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.

**Notice of Trade Agreements:**

This procurement is subject to the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).

**Procurement Details:**

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* Contact information for Ashley Nadeau-Weeks, Procurement Specialist, can be found in the attached documents.

Attached documents include:
[2 PDF files in English and French]
Notice of Proposed Procurement
Request for Proposal (RFP) Clauses
